55870.summary: Some customers in the Heritage Mountain, Eagle Ridge, Dartmoor, Cassin, Cariboo, Ranch Park, & Maillardville areas of Port Moody are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
